message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $950000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your perspective, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $925000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this valuable asset. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll counter with $887500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the point where I might need to consider other buyers, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with $857500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're concerned about finding other buyers, but I'm still not willing to go above $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a serious offer. I hope we can come to an agreement.
